definitions: To dismiss as inadequate, inappropriate, or not to one's taste.
To refuse to accept (a proposal, idea, etc.).
To refuse to consider or believe.
To fail to show due affection or concern for (someone); rebuff.
To vomit or regurgitate (food or drink).
examples: The committee decided to reject the proposal.
His body might reject the new organ.
The machine will reject faulty items.
